title: Introducing the Instructors
body:
Hey everyone,

Welcome to the Gameplay & Strategy board! I’d like to introduce the Instructor program.

http://i.imgur.com/QneGYw1.png

We’ve set up this group up to allow players we’ve identified as deeply knowledgeable about our game play philosophies to reach out to their fellow players, providing information and helping address questions and concerns you guys bring to our attention.

Instructors are volunteers, not Rioters, so there are some things they can't do (no nerfing champs you want nerfed, sorry!), but they are ready and willing to help you find resources and become a better League of Legends player, the Instructors are here to work with you!

Current Instructors are;
Princess Yaia
LGC Elam 

Q: I want to help! How can I join the Instructors?

We’re always on the lookout for potential Instructors, but we do so with the mentality that actions speak louder than words. If you’d like to wear the badge of an Instructor, show us that you can do it by continuing to help answer the questions of your fellow summoners in a friendly and professional manner. We’ll be watching!

sion support ftw

If your playing support (Or leesin as this is apparently a thing)
You should ALWAYS get sight stone, why?

It grants HP: Something every support needs.  If your complaining about not being tanky enough, or not having enough health
(As you should be prioritising that over DMG) Then sightstone is good.

Relic shield is good for those like braum, leona, taric and thresh.
Procing the shield gives HP to you and your carry.
upgraded relic shield + Sightsotne makes you lose on some stacks.

Frost queen is good for AP + CD. Fully upgraded has the ghost effect, good for dis engaging + re-engaging.
Mixed in with sightstone removes ghost for more HP.

Talisman, grants more gold then the rest, fully upgraded grants an AoE movespeed.
Which is always good. Mixed in with sightstone I think loses this effect for more HP.

Now.

Why not get both?

A fully Upgraded sightstone grants ALOT of HP.
even has the added bonus of: Item CD reduction (This is important will tell you why this is broken soon.)

You can then have a fully upgraded relic shield (For your bloody sion support)
Lets say you have both of these, a Ruby Sightstone AND Face Of The Mountain.
I believe FoM Active CD is about 1 min. Grants HP/regen and CD.

(FULL STATS
450 HP
100% base HP regen
10% CD
+ gold per X

ACTIVE <= this is important

= to 10% of YOUR MAXIMUM HP (Was right 1 Min CD)
)

Ruby Sightstone full effects.
+ 500 HP
Item Actives are reduced by 20%
Warding.
With this Talisman, Frost Queen, FoM CD is reduced by 12 seconds.
This means a fucking lot in league.

Noe lets assume for your full support sion build.
Merc Boots.
FoM.
Ruby SightStone.
Banshies Veil/Spirit Visage depending on the enemy team.
Dead mans plate / Frozen Mallet once again depending on the enemy team.
Blade Of The ruined King. (This is assuming you would want a DMG item)

You get- (Not including runes / masteries, and assuming you went banshis + Frozen)

HP = 1950
MR = 95 
Movespeed = 45 (Not including stolen move speed by Botrk)
200% Base HP regen
30% Tenacity
10% CD 
Gold per X
Spoils of War Effect:
Active Shielding: 10% of your max HP, 1 Min CD (48 becuase of ruby)
Item CD reduced by 20%
Warding:
Spell Shield every 40 seconds.
30 AD.
40% ATK SPD.
10% Lifesteal.
Icy Effect.
Every AA delas 8% current HP DMG.
Active: deal 10% of the targets maximum HP as DMG, heal for that DMG.
Steal 25% of the targets movespeed.
90 sec CD (72 from ruby's effect)

---

You lack CDR, but then you can have runes for that, having at least 30-40% if you optimize right.
You are plenty tanky, can heal you and your ally.
Provides shields, and ward (WHICH YOU SHOULD BE DOING)
You should be able to provide, plenty of peeling and stuff for your team.
Once your free, or your roaming use your wards to help your team.
Even late game, you should be the first in any fight, use wards to face check bushes so you don't have too.
(Dont forget to swap to sweeper once you get a sightstone)

Because of Blade you should have plenty of DMG, you dont have much armor, so you could swap Frozen mallet for thornmail.
Or use runes and masteries for Armor.

As long as you protect your carries, ward when you can.
It should be really good.
